title: Yeenoghu's Gift
content:
6 Turn Heal-on-Hit (non-refreshing) Madness: Effect: Become hostile to all nearby creatures, including allies, and fight them to the best of your ability. Duration: 1 Turn (mad) Saving Throw: DC12 WIS Save to negate
